trans-unit.source: Provides static methods for the creation, copying, deletion, moving, and opening of a single file, and aids in the creation of <xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供靜態方法，建立、 複製、 刪除、 移動和開啟單一檔案，並協助建立<xref href="System.IO.FileStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: To browse the .NET Framework source code for this type, see the [Reference Source](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#mscorlib/system/io/file.cs#1c7421e464f67b7e).
trans-unit.target: 若要瀏覽此類型的.NET Framework 原始程式碼，請參閱[參考來源](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#mscorlib/system/io/file.cs#1c7421e464f67b7e)。

trans-unit.source: Appends lines to a file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 檔案中，加入幾行內容，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the specified file does not exist, this method creates a file, writes the specified lines to the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的檔案不存在，這個方法會建立一個檔案，將指定的程式行寫入檔案，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The method creates the file if it doesn’t exist, but it doesn't create new directories.
trans-unit.target: 如果它不存在，但它不會建立新的目錄，此方法會建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the value of the `path` parameter must contain existing directories.
trans-unit.target: 因此，值`path`參數必須包含現有的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The file to append the lines to.
trans-unit.target: 要附加的程式碼列的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file is created if it doesn't already exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在，會建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: The lines to append to the file.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至檔案的行。

trans-unit.source: path is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one more invalid characters defined by the method.
trans-unit.target: path為零長度字串、 只包含空格，或包含所定義的一個更多的無效字元方法。

trans-unit.source: Either path or contents is .
trans-unit.target: Either path or contents is .

trans-unit.source: path is invalid (for example, the directory doesn’t exist or it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: path無效 （例如，此目錄不存在或它位於未對應的磁碟機上）。

trans-unit.source: The file specified by path was not found.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的檔案 path 找不到。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: path exceeds the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: path超過系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: path is in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: path是無效的格式。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have permission to write to the file.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有寫入檔案的權限。

trans-unit.target: path指定了唯讀的檔案。

trans-unit.target: -或-path是目錄。

trans-unit.source: Appends lines to a file by using a specified encoding, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的編碼，加入幾行內容的檔案，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the specified file does not exist, this method creates a file, writes the specified lines to the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的檔案不存在，這個方法會建立一個檔案，將指定的程式行寫入檔案，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The method creates the file if it doesn’t exist, but it doesn't create new directories.
trans-unit.target: 如果它不存在，但它不會建立新的目錄，此方法會建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the value of the `path` parameter must contain existing directories.
trans-unit.target: 因此，值`path`參數必須包含現有的目錄。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to create a file that contains the following: - The results of a [LINQ to Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) query on the lines of a file, as obtained by using the <xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來建立包含下列檔案:-結果[LINQ to Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)取得使用的查詢上的檔案、 行<xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.File.ReadLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a collection that implements an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of strings.
trans-unit.target: -集合中實作的內容<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>的字串。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: Opens a file, appends the specified string to the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案，將指定的字串附加至檔案，，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the file does not exist, this method creates a file, writes the specified string to the file, then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案不存在，這個方法會建立一個檔案，將指定的字串寫入檔案，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: Given a string and a file path, this method opens the specified file, appends the string to the end of the file, and then closes the file.
trans-unit.target: 指定字串和檔案路徑，這個方法開啟指定的檔案、 字串附加至檔案的結尾，然後關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file handle is guaranteed to be closed by this method, even if exceptions are raised.
trans-unit.target: 即使引發例外狀況時要使用這個方法，關閉保證的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The method creates the file if it doesn’t exist, but it doesn't create new directories.

trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>utf-8 編碼將文字附加至現有的檔案，或新檔案如果指定的檔案不存在。</xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor overload.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>建構函式多載。</xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: If the file specified by `path` does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的檔案`path`不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: If the file does exist, write operations to the <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> append text to the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案不存在，寫入作業<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>將文字附加至檔案。</xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>

trans-unit.source: Additional threads are permitted to read the file while it is open.
trans-unit.target: 讀取檔案開啟時，允許額外執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts a file that was encrypted by the current account using the <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt*> method.
trans-unit.target: 解密目前帳戶使用加密檔案<xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt*>方法。</xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt*>

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method allows you to decrypt a file that was encrypted using the <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 解密方法可讓您將使用加密檔案解密<xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method can decrypt only files that were encrypted using the current user account.
trans-unit.target: 解密方法可以解密使用目前的使用者帳戶已加密的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The Decrypt method requires exclusive access to the file being decrypted, and will raise an exception if another process is using the file.
trans-unit.target: 解密方法需要獨佔存取檔案，進行解密，並會引發例外狀況，如果另一個處理序正在使用檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the file is not encrypted, Decrypt will return a nonzero value, which indicates success.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案未加密，解密就會傳回非零值，表示成功。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A> method and the Decrypt method use the cryptographic service provider (CSP) installed on the computer and the file encryption keys of the process calling the method.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A>和解密方法使用電腦上安裝並呼叫方法的程序的檔案加密金鑰的密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。</xref:System.IO.File.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: Encrypts a file so that only the account used to encrypt the file can decrypt it.
trans-unit.target: 加密檔案，只有使用加密檔案的帳戶才能將其解密。

trans-unit.source: The Encrypt method allows you to encrypt a file so that only the account used to call this method can decrypt it.
trans-unit.target: 加密方法可讓您加密檔案，以便只有呼叫這個方法所使用的帳戶才能將其解密。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A> method to decrypt a file encrypted by the Encrypt method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>方法來解密加密的加密方法的檔案。</xref:System.IO.File.Decrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Encrypt method requires exclusive access to the file being encrypted, and will fail if another process is using the file.
trans-unit.target: 加密方法需要獨佔存取權所加密的檔案，而且如果另一個處理序正在使用檔案將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified file exists.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的檔案是否存在。

trans-unit.source: The Exists method should not be used for path validation, this method merely checks if the file specified in `path` exists.
trans-unit.target: Exists 方法不應該用於路徑驗證時，這個方法只會檢查中是否指定的檔案`path`存在。

trans-unit.source: Passing an invalid path to Exists returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 將無效的路徑傳遞至 Exists 傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: To check whether the path contains any invalid characters, you can call the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method to retrieve the characters that are invalid for the file system.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查路徑是否包含任何無效的字元，您可以呼叫<xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A>方法來擷取檔案系統無效字元。</xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also create a regular expression to test the whether the path is valid for your environment.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立規則運算式來測試是否為您的環境的有效路徑。

trans-unit.source: For examples of acceptable paths, see <xref:System.IO.File>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可接受的路徑的範例，請參閱<xref:System.IO.File>.</xref:System.IO.File>

trans-unit.source: To check if a directory exists, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.Exists%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查如果目錄存在，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.Exists%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.IO.Directory.Exists%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Be aware that another process can potentially do something with the file in between the time you call the Exists method and perform another operation on the file, such as <xref:System.IO.File.Delete%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 要注意，另一個處理序可以可能會進行處理的時間之間的檔案呼叫 Exists 方法並執行其他操作檔案，例如<xref:System.IO.File.Delete%2A>.</xref:System.IO.File.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `path` describes a directory, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`描述目錄中，這個方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the `path` parameter before determining if the file exists.
trans-unit.target: 尾端空白會從`path`參數，然後再判斷如果檔案存在。

trans-unit.source: The Exists method returns `false` if any error occurs while trying to determine if the specified file exists.
trans-unit.target: Exists 方法會傳回`false`如果發生任何錯誤時嘗試判斷指定的檔案是否存在。

trans-unit.source: This can occur in situations that raise exceptions such as passing a file name with invalid characters or too many characters, a failing or missing disk, or if the caller does not have permission to read the file.
trans-unit.target: 可能發生這種情況下，會引發例外狀況，例如傳遞檔名無效的字元或太多的字元，失敗或遺失的磁碟，或如果呼叫端沒有讀取檔案的權限。

trans-unit.source: The file to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的檔案。

trans-unit.source: if the caller has the required permissions and path contains the name of an existing file; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫端具有必要的權限和 path 包含現有檔案的名稱，否則 。

trans-unit.source: This method also returns if path is , an invalid path, or a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會傳回如果 path 是 ，無效的路徑或零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: If the caller does not have sufficient permissions to read the specified file, no exception is thrown and the method returns regardless of the existence of path.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫端沒有足夠的權限讀取指定的檔案，會擲回任何例外狀況，而且方法會傳回不論是否存在 path 。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref> object that encapsulates the access control list (ACL) entries for a specified file.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref>封裝指定檔案之存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the GetAccessControl method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for a file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 GetAccessControl 方法來擷取檔案的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 加入或移除存取控制清單項目](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: In NTFS environments, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> are granted to the user if the user has <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> rights on the parent folder.
trans-unit.target: 在 NTFS 環境中，<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>授與使用者時如果使用者具有<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>父資料夾的權限。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: To deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>, deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> on the parent directory.
trans-unit.target: 若要拒絕<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>，拒絕<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>父目錄上。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: Use the GetAccessControl method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for a file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 GetAccessControl 方法來擷取檔案的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 加入或移除存取控制清單項目](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: In NTFS environments, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> are granted to the user if the user has <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> rights on the parent folder.
trans-unit.target: 在 NTFS 環境中，<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>授與使用者時如果使用者具有<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>父資料夾的權限。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: To deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>, deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> on the parent directory.
trans-unit.target: 若要拒絕<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>，拒絕<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>父目錄上。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>

trans-unit.source: The path to a file containing a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref> object that describes the file's access control list (ACL) information.
trans-unit.target: 包含檔案路徑<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref>描述檔案的存取控制清單 (ACL) 資訊的物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref> values that specifies the type of access control list (ACL) information to receive.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections"></xref>值，指定類型的存取控制清單 (ACL) 資訊，接收。

trans-unit.source: A object that encapsulates the access control rules for the file described by the path parameter.
trans-unit.target: A 規則所描述的檔案封裝的存取控制的物件 path 參數。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The path parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The path parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The file could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: The path parameter specified a file that is read-only.
trans-unit.target: path 參數指定為唯讀的檔案。

trans-unit.source: -or- This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: -或者-目前的平台不支援此作業。

trans-unit.source: -or- The path parameter specified a directory.

trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.IO.FileAttributes"></xref>路徑上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: The path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IO.FileAttributes"></xref> of the file on the path.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IO.FileAttributes"> </xref>路徑上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: path is empty, contains only white spaces, or contains invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: path是空的、 只包含空格，或包含無效的字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、 檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，windows 平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，和檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: path is in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: path是無效的格式。

trans-unit.source: path represents a file and is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive, or the file cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: path代表檔案並不正確，例如位於未對應的磁碟機或檔案上找不到。

trans-unit.source: path represents a directory and is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive, or the directory cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: path代表目錄而且無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機或目錄上找不到。

trans-unit.source: This file is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 這個檔案正由另一個處理序使用。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Returns the creation date and time of the specified file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的建立日期和時間的指定的檔案或目錄。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> 這個方法可能傳回不正確的值，因為它會使用其值不一定會持續更新作業系統的原生函式。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the file described in the `path` parameter does not exist, this method returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案中所述`path`參數不存在，這個方法會傳回午夜 12:00，1601年西元 1

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time.
trans-unit.target: (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)，調整為本地時間。

trans-unit.source: NTFS-formatted drives may cache information about a file, such as file creation time, for a short period of time.
trans-unit.target: NTFS 格式化磁碟機可能會快取檔案，例如一段時間的檔案建立時間的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: As a result, it may be necessary to explicitly set the creation time of a file if you are overwriting or replacing an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，可能需要明確地將設定檔的建立時間，如果您要覆寫或取代現有的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、 檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，windows 平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，和檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: path is in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: path是無效的格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the date and time, in coordinated universal time (UTC), that the specified file or directory was last written to.
trans-unit.target: 會傳回日期和時間，在國際標準時間 (UTC)，指定的檔案或目錄上次被寫入至。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> 這個方法可能傳回不正確的值，因為它會使用其值不一定會持續更新作業系統的原生函式。

trans-unit.source: Each operating system manages the last write time according to its own rules.
trans-unit.target: 每個作業系統管理上次寫入時間根據自己的規則。

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, an operating system might not set the last write time value to the exact time of the last write operation, but might set it to a close approximation instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要改善效能，系統可能未設定上次寫入時間值的最後一個寫入作業，確切的時間，但可能會將它設定為近似值而。

trans-unit.source: If the file described in the `path` parameter does not exist, this method returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案中所述`path`參數不存在，這個方法會傳回午夜 12:00，1601年西元 1

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: (C.E.)國際標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以指定相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需的一般 I/O 工作清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The file or directory for which to obtain write date and time information.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或要取得其寫入日期和時間資訊的目錄中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> structure set to the date and time that the specified file or directory was last written to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>結構，設定指定的檔案或目錄上次被寫入至的時間與日期。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in UTC time.
trans-unit.target: 這個值以 UTC 時間表示。

trans-unit.source: Moves a specified file to a new location, providing the option to specify a new file name.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的檔案移至新的位置，並提供指定新的檔案名稱的選項。

trans-unit.source: This method works across disk volumes, and it does not throw an exception if the source and destination are the same.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法適用於跨磁碟區，它不會擲回例外狀況時的來源和目的地相同。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you attempt to replace a file by moving a file of the same name into that directory, you get an <xref:System.IO.IOException>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，是否您嘗試將相同名稱的檔案移到該目錄取代檔案，您取得<xref:System.IO.IOException>.</xref:System.IO.IOException>

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the Move method to overwrite an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用 Move 方法覆寫現有檔案。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceFileName` and `destFileName` arguments can include relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `sourceFileName`和`destFileName`引數可以包含相對或絕對路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相對路徑的資訊會解譯為與目前工作目錄。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得目前工作目錄，請參閱<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you try to move a file across disk volumes and that file is in use, the file is copied to the destination, but it is not deleted from the source.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試在磁碟區之間移動檔案和檔案正在使用中，將檔案複製到目的地，但不是會從來源刪除。

trans-unit.source: The OpenWrite method opens a file if one already exists for the file path, or creates a new file if one does not exist.
trans-unit.target: OpenWrite 方法開啟的檔案，其中一個已存在的檔案路徑，或如果不存在的話，會建立新的檔案。

trans-unit.source: For an existing file, it does not append the new text to the existing text.
trans-unit.target: 現有的檔案，它不會將新的文字附加至現有的文字。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it overwrites the existing characters with the new characters.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會覆寫現有的字元與新的字元。

trans-unit.source: If you overwrite a longer string (such as “This is a test of the OpenWrite method”) with a shorter string (such as “Second run”), the file will contain a mix of the strings (“Second runtest of the OpenWrite method”).
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫較長的字串 （例如，"This is OpenWrite 方法的測試)"使用較短的字串 （例如 [第二個執行]），檔案會包含字串的混合 (「 第二個 runtest OpenWrite 方法的")。

trans-unit.source: Reads the lines of a file.
trans-unit.target: 讀取檔案的所有行。

trans-unit.source: The ReadLines and <xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use ReadLines, you can start enumerating the collection of strings before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of strings be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: ReadLines 和<xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>方法不同，如下所示︰ 如果您使用 ReadLines，就可以開始之前，會傳回整個集合列舉字串的集合，則當您使用<xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>，您必須等候之前可以存取陣列傳回字串的整個陣列。</xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A> </xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with very large files, ReadLines can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用非常大型的檔案，ReadLines 可以更有效率。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ReadLines method to do the following: - Perform [LINQ to Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) queries on a file to obtain a filtered set of its lines.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ReadLines 方法，執行下列動作:-執行[LINQ to Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)檔案以取得一組篩選其線條上的查詢。

trans-unit.source: - Write the returned collection of lines to a file with the <xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=fullName> method, or append them to an existing file with the <xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: -寫入的檔案所傳回之集合的行<xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法，或將它們附加至現有的檔案與<xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Create an immediately populated instance of a collection that takes an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of strings for its constructor, such as a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> or a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Queue%601>.
trans-unit.target: -建立立即填入的集合，其中採用<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>字串的建構函式，例如<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601><xref:System.Collections.Generic.Queue%601>.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.Queue%601>或</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>集合</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>的執行個體

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A> for the encoding value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用<xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>編碼值。</xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>

trans-unit.source: Read the lines of a file that has a specified encoding.
trans-unit.target: 讀取具有指定的編碼方式的檔案所有行。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to specify an encoding to use read the file.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來指定要使用的編碼方式讀取檔案。

trans-unit.source: The ReadLines and <xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use ReadLines, you can start enumerating the collection of strings before the whole collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: ReadLines 和<xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>方法不同，如下所示︰ 如果您使用 ReadLines，就可以開始之前，會傳回整個集合列舉字串的集合。</xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of strings be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>，您必須等候之前可以存取陣列傳回字串的整個陣列。</xref:System.IO.File.ReadAllLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with very large files, ReadLines can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您使用非常大型的檔案，ReadLines 可以更有效率。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ReadLines method to do the following: - Perform [LINQ to Objects](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) queries on a file to obtain a filtered set of its lines.

trans-unit.target: -寫入的檔案所傳回之集合的行<xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法，或將它們附加至現有的檔案與<xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.IO.File.AppendAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.File.WriteAllLines%28System.String%2CSystem.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.String%7D%2CSystem.Text.Encoding%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file, deleting the original file, and creating a backup of the replaced file.
trans-unit.target: 另一個檔案，刪除原始檔案，並建立已取代檔案的備份的內容，取代指定檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: The Replace method replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file.
trans-unit.target: Replace 方法，另一個檔案的內容取代指定檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 它也會建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: If the `sourceFileName` and `destinationFileName` are on different volumes, this method will raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceFileName`和`destinationFileName`會在不同的磁碟區，這個方法會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `destinationBackupFileName` is on a different volume from the source file, the backup file will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`destinationBackupFileName`是在原始程式檔中的不同磁碟區，將執行的動作會刪除備份檔案。

trans-unit.source: Pass `null` to the `destinationBackupFileName` parameter if you do not want to create a backup of the file being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`null`至`destinationBackupFileName`參數，如果您不想建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: The name of a file that replaces the file specified by `destinationFileName`.
trans-unit.target: 取代所指定的檔案的檔案名稱`destinationFileName`。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file, deleting the original file, and creating a backup of the replaced file and optionally ignores merge errors.
trans-unit.target: 另一個檔案，刪除原始檔案，並建立已取代檔案的備份的內容取代指定檔案的內容，並選擇性地忽略合併錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The Replace method replaces the contents of a specified file with the contents of another file.
trans-unit.target: Replace 方法，另一個檔案的內容取代指定檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: It also creates a backup of the file that was replaced.
trans-unit.target: 它也會建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: If the `sourceFileName` and `destinationFileName` are on different volumes, this method will raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`sourceFileName`和`destinationFileName`會在不同的磁碟區，這個方法會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `destinationBackupFileName` is on a different volume from the source file, the backup file will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`destinationBackupFileName`是在原始程式檔中的不同磁碟區，將執行的動作會刪除備份檔案。

trans-unit.source: Pass `null` to the `destinationBackupFileName` parameter if you do not want to create a backup of the file being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`null`至`destinationBackupFileName`參數，如果您不想建立已取代檔案的備份。

trans-unit.source: The name of the backup file.
trans-unit.target: 備份檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to ignore merge errors (such as attributes and access control lists (ACLs)) from the replaced file to the replacement file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref> object to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 適用於所描述的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity"></xref>物件至指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The SetAccessControl method applies access control list (ACL) entries to a file that represents the noninherited ACL list.
trans-unit.target: SetAccessControl 方法適用於存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目代表 noninherited 的 ACL 清單的檔案。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The ACL specified for the `fileSecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the file.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > ACL 指定`fileSecurity`參數已取代現有檔案的 ACL。

trans-unit.source: To add permissions for a new user, use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> method to obtain the existing ACL, modify it, and then use SetAccessControl to apply it back to the file.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入之新使用者的權限，請使用<xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來取得現有的 ACL、 修改它，然後使用 SetAccessControl 來套用該備份檔案。</xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 加入或移除存取控制清單項目](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The SetAccessControl method persists only <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> objects that have been modified after object creation.
trans-unit.target: 只保存 SetAccessControl 方法<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>物件建立後已修改的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>不修改物件，不會保存至檔案。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object from one file and reapply the same object to another file.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不可以擷取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>物件從一個檔案，並重新套用到另一個檔案的相同物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: To copy ACL information from one file to another: 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要將 ACL 資訊從一個檔案複製到另一個︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object from the source file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來擷取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>從原始程式檔的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> </xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object for the destination file.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>目的地檔案的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method of the source <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object to retrieve the ACL information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>來源方法<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>擷取 ACL 資訊的物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>方法可複製的資訊擷取到目的地的步驟 3 中<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>物件。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>

trans-unit.source: In NTFS environments, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> are granted to the user if the user has <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> rights on the parent folder.

trans-unit.source: To deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights>, deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights> on the parent directory.

trans-unit.source: path is or contents is empty.
trans-unit.target: pathis or contents is empty.

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、 檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，windows 平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，和檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效 （例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上）。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: path specified a file that is read-only.
trans-unit.target: path指定為唯讀的檔案。

trans-unit.source: -or- This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: -或者-目前的平台不支援此作業。

trans-unit.source: -or- path specified a directory.
trans-unit.target: -或-path指定了目錄。
